sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Benchmarks.css' import { Button, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' class Benchmarks extends Component { state = { updateModeOn: false } toggleUpdateMode = () => { this.setState({ updateModeOn: !this.state.updateModeOn }) } render() { const { deadlift, strict_press, clean_and_jerk, backsquat, snatch } = this.props const { updateModeOn } = this.state return ( <> ); } } export default Benchmarks;
